forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a splendid canvas of bright blue skies, punctuated only by the soft brush of clouds, as a gentle breeze whispers through the streets. With the temperature stabilizing around a comfortable 62 degrees, and a fresh west-southwest wind briskly nudging up to 22 mph, the day feels lively yet inviting. As the sun casts its warm glow, there’s a sense of promise in the air, a perfect prelude to a pleasant evening.

As twilight approaches, the clouds will weave themselves into the fabric of the sky, settling into a partly cloudy demeanor, but temperatures will ease down to a serene 51 degrees. This is a moment to wrap a light sweater around your shoulders, stepping softly onto the sidewalks as you soak in the sights and sounds of the city. A walk along the Embarcadero could reveal the twinkling lights of the Bay, with a soft murmur of water lapping against the shore—a perfect backdrop for quiet contemplation or animated conversation with a friend. While there may not be any notable fog on the horizon, the occasional glimpse of the marine layer adds to the city's ethereal charm. This evening invites simplicity; perhaps enjoy a cozy dinner at a neighborhood café or an art gallery stroll, embracing the gentle transition from day to night.
